pa_client_mobile = #{clientMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from pa_peappointment where pa_is_valid = 1 and pa_client_mobile = #{clientMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pp_product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by pa_appointment_time desc

select
from pa_peappointment where pa_is_valid = 1
and pa_client_name like concat(concat('%',#{model.clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and pa_client_mobile like concat(concat('%',#{model.clientMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and pp_product_id in (select pp_product_id from pp_peproduct where pp_product_status= #{model.productStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and pp_product_name like concat(concat('%',#{model.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
order by pa_appointment_time desc
